text: I'm having this same issue. lol

> you're showing is the Theme page, not the template page. You have to first choose the theme that your template is connected to and then you'll be able to see the templates you've created for that theme.
I figured that's the case, but my problem is and his too -- our created theme is not showing when you search for it.  As you can see I have a theme created, some modules and templates.
<@U02227D27V3> Can anyone watch this video and identify the issue for me?

I've resolved the issue. The name of my theme is actually specified in the theme.json file, not by the folder name. I didn't realize it was called 'CMS Theme Boilerplate'. I was mistakenly searching for 'test-theme', which is the name of my folder, but the real name was right there in the theme.json file all along. :laughing: I hope my mistake can be a helpful lesson for someone else.
